General.Name: GIEAG Immobilien AG
General.Description: GIEAG Immobilien AG develops commercial and residential properties in southern Germany. It invests in, develops, manages, and rents properties in the areas of office, residential, and logistics. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Munich, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Philipp  Pferschy M.A., M.A. HSG
0.Title: CEO & Member of Management Board
